item.title: Publications

Global health research and policy 6 (1), 1-9. B Rosner, J Neicun, JC Yang, A Roman-Urrestarazu. (2021). Substance use among sexual minorities in the US–Linked to inequalities and unmet need for mental health treatment? Results from the National Survey on Drug Use and Health (NSDUH).

item.title: Teaching & Supervision
item.description: University College London I’m a Teaching Assistant for the Practical Statistics for Mental Health Research module on the MSc in Mental Health Sciences Research course. I also mark for the Current Research in Depression and Anxiety and Current Research in Psychosis and Bipolar Disorder modules. I’m always happy to co-supervise MSc students completing their dissertations using the Research Database at Camden & Islington NHS Foundation Trust. Queen Mary University of London I’m a dissertation supervisor on the MSc in Global Public Health and Policy course where I mainly supervise projects pertaining to secondary data analysis, substance-related use disorders, and comparative health policy.
